description: This file declares external function prototypes related to the Slap Bmc2 Domain Object, a component of the Service Logic Aggregation Plane in the BroadWay Service Delivery System. It provides creation, retrieval, removal, and initialization functions for this domain object.

methods.name: SlapCreateBmc2Domain
methods.description: Creates a new Bmc2Domain object within a given container and owner context.

methods.name: SlapBmc2DomoGetSlapObjCallMap
methods.description: Retrieves the SLAP object call map associated with the domain.

methods.name: SlapBmc2DomoGetSlapObjDescriptor
methods.description: Retrieves the descriptor for the SLAP object.

methods.name: SlapBmc2DomoCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Bmc2Domain object.

methods.name: SlapBmc2DomoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified Bmc2Domain object instance.

methods.name: SlapBmc2DomoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls the necessary objects into the Bmc2Domain instance.

methods.name: SlapBmc2DomoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Bmc2Domain object to a ready state.
